#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,a,b,c;
    unsigned long s;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>a>>b>>c;
        s=0;
        if(a>n) a=n;
        for(int i=0;i<=a;i++)
        {
            for(int j=0;j<=((n-i<b)?(n-i):(b));j++)
            {
                s+=1+((c<=n-i-j)?(c):(n-i-j));
           }
        }
        cout<<s<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
